‘Ere is a repository of uninteresting projects

Ulam Spiral

I made this a while ago because i get interested in the Ulam Spiral.

I thought it might reveal some more patterns to color pixels by number of prime factors. That worked, but the link will take you to a canvas which simply colors the semiprimes. Because I think that’s cooler.
